column4: does anyone know how I can keep my cpufreq from changing frequencies? The only two frequencies that are available are 1.0 ghz and 1.8 ghz. I need to figure out a way to keep it from chaing back to 1.0 ghz
sometimes when I set it, it stays set, but sometimes it doesn't and if it keeps changing on its own, it make my computer freeze up.
either in bios or de-install the cpu-gooverneur you use, cpudyn or cpufreqd most likely, though it can also be set in the config
have you got an applet showing your current speed ?
